title: Real-Time Collaborative Learning-Based Russian Vocabulary and Oral Expression Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Utilizing smartphone-based text chat, combining offline sessions with online collaborative activities

learning_goals: Through two weeks of collaborative activities, learners can appropriately utilize 150 specialized Russian vocabulary terms in context.
Learners can imitate and generate spoken expressions with over 80% accuracy during real-time text chat interactions with peers.
Learners can improve error correction rates by over 60% through feedback exchange and meaning negotiation.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
